name: Epic War
description:
Controls:

Left/Right arrows - scroll the battlefield
Up/Down arrows - change shooting angle
1 - train Hobbit unit
2 - train Dwarf unit
3 - train Elf unit
4 - train Wizard unit
5 - summon Golem unit
6 - summon Dragon unit
7 - summon Angel unit
SPACE - use Special attack
A - fire Default Arrow
S - fire Fire Arrow
D - fire Thunder Arrow
F - fire Ice Arrow
Q - build Turret unit
W - build Barrier unit
E - build Trap unit
R - use More Mana ability
